sections.text: a~ggirasO̍ vai satramAsata|tEṣAM̍ pRuśnir-GarmadhugA̍sIt|sarjIṣEṇA̍jIvat|tE̱&bruvann|kasmai̍ nu satramA̱smahE|yE̱&syA OṣadhIrna̍ janayAma̍ iti|tE̍ divO vRuṣṭi-masRujanta|yAva̍ntaḥ̍ stOkA avApadyanta|tAva̍tIrOṣa̍dhayO̍ &jAyanta||tA jAtAḥ pitarO# viṣEṇAlimpann|1̍ (10)

tAsA̱M jagdhvA rupyantyait|tE̱&bruvann|ka idamittha-makariti̍|vayaM̍ BAgadhEya̍-micCamA̍nA̍ iti# pitarO̱&bruvann|kiM ~MvO# BAgadhEyamiti|agnihOtra̍ Eva nO&pyastvitya-bruvann|tEBya̍# Etad-BAgadhEyaM̍ prAyacCann|yaddhutvA̍ nimArṣṭi|tatO̍ vai ta OṣadhIra-svadayann||ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda|2̍ (10)

svadantE&smA̍ Oṣadhayaḥ|tE̍ vathsamu-pAvAsRujann|idaM̍ nO# havyaM pradApayEti̍|sO̱&bravIdvara̍M̍ ~MvRuṇai|daśa# mA rAtrI̱rjAtaM na dOhann|Asa~ggavaM̍ mAtrA saha carAṇIti̍|tasmA̱d-vathsaM̍ jAtaM daśa rAtrIrna duhanti|Asa~ggavaM̍ mAtrA saha carati|vArE̍vRutaṅqhya̍sya|tasmA̱d-vathsaṃ̍ saṃsRuṣṭadhayaṃ̍ rudrO GAtukaḥ̍ ( )|ati hi sandhAM dhayati||3̍ (11) 2.1.2 anuvAkaM 2 - agnihOtranirUpaṇam

prajApati-ragni-ma̍sRujata|taM̍ prajA anvasRujyanta|tama̍BAga̍ upA̱sta|sO̱&sya prajABi-rapA̱krAmat|tamavaruru̍th-samAnO&nvai̱t|tama̍varudhaM̍ nAśaknOt|sa̍ tapO# &tapyata|sO̱&gni-rupAramatAtA̍pi̍ vai sya prajApatiriti̍|sa̍ rarAṭAdudamRuṣṭa|4̍ (9)

tad-GRutamaBavat|tasmAdyasya̍# dakṣiṇataḥ kEśA unmRuṣṭAḥ|tAM̍ jyE̱ṣṭhalakṣmI prAjApatyEtyA̍huḥ|yad-rarAṭA̍dudamRu̍ṣṭa|tasmA̱d-rarAṭE̍ kEśA na santi|tadagnau̍ prAgRuhṇAt|tadvya̍cikithsat|juhavAnI(3)̍ mA hauṣA(3)miti|tad-vi̍cikithsAyai̍ janma||ya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAn. vicikithsa̍ti|5̍ (10)

vasIya̍ Eva cEtayatE||taM̍ ~MvAgaByavada-jjuhudhIti̍|sO̱&bravIt|kastvamasIti̍|svaiva̍ tE vAgityabravIt|sO̍&juhOth-svAhEti̍|tathsvA̍hAkArasya̍ janma||ya̍ Evaṅ svAhAkArasya̍ janma vEda|karOti̍# svAhAkArEṇa# vIrya̱m||yasyaivaM ~Mviduṣaḥ̍ svAhAkArEṇa juhvati|6̍ (10)

BOgAyaivAsya̍# hutaM Bavati||tasyA̍ Ahutyai̍ puruṣa-masRujata|dvitIya̍-majuhOt|sO&śva̍-masRujata|tRutIya̍-majuhOt|sa̍ gAmasRujata|caturtha-ma̍juhOt|sO&vi̍masRujata|pa~jcama-ma̍juhOt|sO̍&jAma̍sRujata|7̍ (10)

sO̱&gni-rabiBEt|Ahu̍tIBirvai̍ mA̱&&pnOtIti|sa̍ prajApatiM̍ punaḥ prAviśat|taM̍ prajApati-rabravIt|jAyasvEti̍|sO̱&bravIt|kiM̍ BAgadhEya̍maBi̍ janiṣya̍ iti|tuBya̍mEvEdaṃ̍ hUyAtA̍ ityabravIt|sa̍ Etad-BAgadhEya̍maBya̍jAyata|yada̍gnihOtram|8̍ (10)

tasmAdagnihOtra-mu̍cyatE||taddhUyamA̍na-mAdityO̱&bravIt|mA̍ hauṣIḥ|uBayOrvai-nA̍vEtaditi̍|sO̱&gni-ra̍bravIt|kathaM̍ nau# hOṣyantIti|sAyamEva̍ tuByaM̍ juhavann|prAtarmahya-mitya̍bravIt|tasmA̍dagnayE̍# sAyaṃ hUyatE|sUryA̍ya̍ prAtaḥ

AgnEyI vai rAtriḥ|aindramaha̍ḥ|yadanu̍ditE̍ sUryE̱ prAtarjuhuyAt|uBaya̍mEvAgnEyaṅ̍ syA̱t|uditE̍ sUryE̱ prAtarjuhOti|tathA&gnayE̍# sAyaṃ hUyatE|sUryA̍ya̍ prAtaḥ||rAtriM ~MvA anu# prajAḥ pra jAyantE|ahnA̍ prati# tiṣṭhanti|yathsAyaM juhOti|10̍ (10)

praiva tEna# jAyatE|uditE̍ sUryE̱ prAtar-juhOti|pratyEva̍ tEna# tiṣṭhati||prajApatira-kAmayata̍ prajAyEyEti̍|sa̍ EtadagnihOtraM̍ mithuna-ma̍paśyat|tadudi̍tE̍ sUryE&juhOt|yaju̍ṣA̍ &nyat|tUṣṇImanyat|tatO vai sa prAjAyata|yasyaivaM̍ ~Mviduṣa uditE̍ sUryE̱&gnihOtraM juhvati|11̍ (10)

praiva jAyatE|athO̍ yathA divA̱ prajAnannEti|tAdRugEva̍ tat||athO KalvAhuḥ|yasya̍ vai dvau puṇyau# gRuhE vasataḥ|yastayO̍ranyaṃ̍ rAdhayatyanyaM̍ na|uBau vAva sa tAvRucCatIti̍|agniM̍ ~MvAvAdityaḥ sAyaM praviśati|tasmA̍dagnirdUrAnnakta̍M̍ dadRuśE|uBE hi tEjasI̍ sapaMdyEtE|12̍ (10)

udyantaM ~MvAvAditya-magniranu# samArOhati|tasmA̱ddhUma̍ EvAgnErdivA# dadRuśE|yadagnayE# sAyaM juhuyAt|A̍ sUryAya̍ vRuścyEta|yathsUryAya̍ prAtar-juhuyAt|A&gnayE̍# vRuścyEta|dEvatA̱Byaḥ samadaM̍ daddhyAt|agnirjyOtir-jyOtiḥ sUryaḥ svAhEtyEva sAyaṃ hOtavya̱m|sUryO̍ jyOtir jyOtiragniḥ̍ svAhEti# prAtaḥ|tathOBAByAṃ# sAyaṃ hUyatE|13̍ (10)

uBAByA̱M prAtaḥ|na dEvatA̱Byaḥ samadaM̍ dadhAti||agnirjyOtirityAha|agnirvai̍ rEtOdhAḥ||prajA̍ jyOtirityAha|prajA̍ EvAsmai pra janayati||sUryO̍ jyOtirityAha|prajAsvEva̍ prajAtAsu̍ rEtO# dadhAti||jyOtiragniḥ̍ svAhEtyAha|prajA̍ Eva prajAtA̍ asyAM pratiṣṭhApayati||14̍ (10)

tUṣṇImuttarA-mAhu̍tiM̍ juhOti|mithunatvAya prajA̱tyai||yaduditE̍ sUryE̱ prAtar-juhuyAt|yathA&ti̍thayE̍ pradrutAya̍ śUnyAyAvasathA-yA̍hAryaṃ̍# haranti|tAdRugEva̍ tat|kvAha tatastad-BavatItyAhuḥ|yathsa̍ na vEda|yasmai̍ taddharantIti|tasmAd-yadau̍ṣasaM̍ juhOti|tadEva̍ sapraMti̍ ( )|athO yathA prArthamauṣasaM̍ pari̍ vEvE̱ṣṭi|tAdRugEva tat||15 (12) (amRuṣṭa - vicikithsati̍ - juhva# - tyajAmasRuja̍ - tAgnihOtraṃ - sUryAya̍ prAtar - juhOti - juhvati̍ - saMpadyEtE̍ - hUyatE - sthApayati - saMprati dvE ca)̍ (A2) 2.1.3 anuvAkaM 3 - upayOkṣyamAṇasya haviṣaḥ saMskAraḥ

rudrO vA Eṣaḥ|yadagniḥ|patnI̱ sthAlI|yanmaddhyE&gnE-radhiśrayE̱t|rudrAya̍ patnImapi# daddhyAt|pramAyukA̍ syAt|udIcO&~ggArAnnirUhyAdhi̍# śrayati|patniyai̍ gOpIthAya||vya̍ntAn̍ karOti|tathA patnya-pramAyukA̍ Bavati

GarmO vA EṣO&śA̱ntaḥ|aharahaḥ̍ pravRujyatE|yada̍gnihOtram|prati̍ṣi~jcEt̍ paśukAmasya|śAntami̍va̍ hi paśavya̱m||na̍ pratiṣi~jcEd-brahmavarcasakA̍masya|sami̍ddhamiva̍ hi brahmavarcasam||athO̍ Kalu|pratiṣicya̍mEva|yat-pra̍tiṣi~jcati̍|17̍ (10)

tat-paśavya̱m|yajjuhOti̍|tadbra̍hmavarcasi|uBaya̍mEvAka̍ḥ||pracyu̍taM̍ ~MvA EtadasmA-llOkAt|agataM̍ dEvalOkam|yacCRutaṃ haviranaBiGAritam|aBidyO̍tayati|aByE̍vaina̍dGArayati|athO̍# dEvatraivainad-gamayati||18̍ (10)

paryagni̍ karOti|rakṣasA-mapa̍hatyai||triḥ̍ paryagni̍ karOti|tryAvRuddhi̍ yajñaḥ|athO# mEddhyatvAya||yat-prAcIna̍-mudvAsayE̱t|yaja̍mAnaṃ̍ śucA &rpayEt|yad-da̍kṣiṇA|pitRudEvatyaṅ̍# syAt|yat-pratyak|19 (10)

patnIṃ# śucA &rpayEt|udIcIna-mudvA̍sayati|EṣA̍ vai dEvamanuṣyAṇAṃ̍# śAntA dik|tAmEvainadanUd-vAsayati̍ śAntyai̱||vartma# karOti|yajñasya saMtatyai||niṣṭa̍pati|upaiva̍ tathstRuṇAti||caturunna̍yati|catu̍ṣpAdaḥ̍ paśavaḥ|20̍ (10)

paśUnEvA-varundhE||sarvA̱n-pUrṇAnunna̍yati|sarvE̍ hi puṇyA# rAddhAḥ||anUca unnayati|prajAyA̍# anUcInatvAya|anUcyEvAsya̍# prajA &rddhukA̍ Bavati||saM mRuśati̍ vyAvRuttyai||nAhO̱ṣyannupa̍# sAdayEt|yadahO̱ṣyannupa sAdayE̱t|yathA &nyasmA# upanidhAya|21̍ (10)

anyasmai̱ prayacCati|tAdRugEva̍ tat|A&smai# vRuścyEta|yadEva gAṛhapatyE&dhiśraya̍ti|tEna̍ gAṛhapatyaM̍ prIṇAti||agnirabiBEt|Ahu̍tayO̍ mA&tyE̱ṣyantIti|sa̍ EtAṃ samidha-mapaśyat|tAmA&dha̍tta|tatO̍ vA agnAvAhutayO&ddhriyanta|22̍ (10)

yadEnaṃ̍ samayacCat|tathsamidha̍ḥ̍ samittvam|samidhamAdadhAti|samEvaina̍M̍ ~MyacCati|AhutInAM̍ dhRutyai̱|athO# agnihOtramEvEddhmavat-karOti|Ahu̍tInAM̍ pratiṣṭhityai||brahmavAdinO̍# vadanti|yadEkAṃ# samidhamAdhAya̍ dvE AhutI̍ juhOti|atha̍ kasyAṃ# samidhi# dvitIyA-mAhutiM̍ juhOtIti|23̍ (10)

yad-dvE samidhAvAdaddhyAt|BrAtRu̍vyamasmai̍ janayEt|EkAṃ# samidhamAdhAya̍|yaju̍ṣA̍ &nyAmAhutiM̍ juhOti|uBE Eva samidvatI̍ AhutI̍ juhOti|nAsmai BrAtRuvyaM̍ janayati||AdI̱ptAyAM juhOti|samiddhamiva̍ hi brahmavarcasam|athO̍ yathA&tithiM̍ jyOtiṣkRutvA̍ parivEvE̱ṣṭi|tAdRugEva̍ tat ( )||caturunnayati|dvirju̍hOti|tasmA̱d-dvipA-ccatu̍ṣpAdamatti|athO̱̍ dvipadyEva catuṣpadaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhApayati||24̍ (14) 2.1.4 anuvAkaM 4 - upayuktasya haviṣaḥ saMskAraḥ

uttarAvatIM̍ ~Mvai dEvA Ahutimaju̍havuḥ|avA̍cImasu̍rAḥ|tatO̍# dEvA aBavann|parA&su̍rAḥ|yaM̍ kAmayEta̍ vasIyAnth̍ syAditi|kanI̍yastasya̍ pUrvaṃ# hutvA|uttaraM̍ BUyO# juhuyAt|EṣA vA uttarAvatyAhu̍tiḥ|tAM̍ dEvA ajuhavuḥ|tatastE̍&Bavann|25̍ (10)

yasyaivaM juhvati|Bava̍tyEva||yaM̍ kAmayEta̍ pApIyAnth̍ syAditi|BUyastasya̍ pUrvaṃ# hutvA|uttaraM̍ kanIyO̍ juhuyAt|EṣA vA avAcyAhutiḥ|tAmasu̍rA̍ ajuhavuḥ|tatastE parA&Bavann|yasyaivaM̍ juhvati|paraiva̍ Bavati||26̍ (10)

hutvOpa# sAdayatyajAmitvAya|athO̍ vyAvRuttyai||gAṛha̍patyaM̍ pratI̱kṣatE|ananuddhyAyina-mEvaina̍M̍ karOti||agnihOtrasya vai sthAṇurasti|taM̍ ~Mya RucCEt|yajñasthAṇumRucCEt|Eṣa̍ vA agnihOtrasya̍# sthAṇuḥ|yat-pUrvA&&hutiḥ|tAM̍ ~MyaduttarayA&Bi̍ juhuyAt|27̍ (10)

yajñasthAṇu-mRucCEt|atihAya̍ pUrvAmAhutiM̍ juhOti|yajñasthAṇumEva pari# vRuṇakti|athO BrAtRuvyamEvAptvA̍ &tikrAmati||avAcInaṃ̍# sAyamupa# mArṣṭi|rEta# Eva tad-dadhAti|UrddhvaM̍ prAtaḥ|pra janayatyEva̍ tat||brahmavAdinO# vadanti|caturunnayati|28̍ (10)

dvirjuhOti|atha̍ kva# dvE AhutI̍ Bavata iti|agnau̍ vai̱śvAnara iti# brUyAt|Eṣa vA agnirvai̱śvAnaraḥ|yadbrA̱hmaṇaḥ|hutvA dviḥ prAśnAti|agnAvEva̍ vai̱śvAnarE dvE AhutI̍ juhOti||dvirjuhOti|dvirnimA̱rṣṭi|dviḥ̍ prAśnAti|29̍ (10)
ṣaṭth saMpadyantE|ṣaḍvA̍ Rutavaḥ|RutUnEva̍ prIṇAti|brahmavAdinO̍# vadanti|kiM dEvatya-magnihOtramiti̍|vaiśvadEvamiti̍# brUyAt|yad-yajuṣA̍ juhOti|tadai̱ndrAgnam|yat-tUṣṇIm|tat-prA̍jApatyam|30̍ (10)
yannimArṣṭi|tadOṣa̍dhInAm|yaddvitIya̱m|tat-pi̍tRuṇAm|yat-prAśnA̍ti|tad-garBA̍ṇAm|tasmAd-garBA̍ anaśnantO̍ varddhantE|yadAcAmati|tanma̍nuṣyA̍ṇAm||uda̍~gparyAvRutyAcA̍mati|31̍ (10)

AtmanO# gOpIthAya||nirṇE̍nEkti̍ śuddhyai̱||niṣṭapati̍ svagAkRutyai|ud-di̍śati|saptaṛqṣInEva̍ prIṇAti||dakṣiṇA̍ paryAvartatE|svamEva̍ vIryamanu̍# paryAvartatE|tasmAd-dakṣiṇO&rddha̍# AtmanO# vIryAvattaraḥ|athO̍# AdityasyaivAvRutamanu# paryAvartatE||hutvOpa̍ samindhE|32̍ (10)

brahmavarcasasya samiddhyai||na̍ baraḥiranu pra harEt|asaṅ̍sthitO̍ vA Eṣa yajñaḥ|yadagnihOtram|yada̍nu̍ praharE̱t|yajñaM ~MvicCindyAt|tasmAnnAnu̍# prahRutya̱m|yajñasya santatyai||apO̍ ni nayati|avaBRuthasyaiva̍ rUpamakaḥ̍ ( )||33 (10) 2.1.5 anuvAkaM 5 - kAmyAni hOmadravyAṇi

brahmavAdinO# vadanti|agnihOtraprAyaṇA̍ yajñAḥ|kiM prAyaṇa-magnihOtramiti̍|vathsO̍ vA agnihOtrasya̍ prAyaṇam|agnihOtraM̍ ~MyajñAnA̱m||tasya# pRuthivI sadaḥ|antari̍kṣa-mAgnI̱ddhram|dyauṛ-ha̍virddhAna̱m|divyA̍ Apaḥ prOkṣaṇayaḥ|Oṣa̍dhayO̍ baraḥiḥ|34 (10)

vanaspataya̍ iddhmaḥ|diśaḥ̍ paridhayaḥ|AdityO̍ yUpaḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ̍ paśuḥ|samudrO&vaBRuthaḥ|sam~Mvathsaraḥ̍ svagAkAraḥ|tasmAdAhi̍tAgnEḥ̍ sarvamEva̍ barhiṣya̍M̍ dattaM Bavati|yath̍ sAyaM juhOti|rAtri̍mEva̍ tEna# dakṣiṇyA̱M kurutE|yat-prAtaḥ|35 (10)

aharEva̍ tEna# dakṣiṇyaM̍ kurutE|yat-tatO dadAti|sA̍ dakṣiṇA||yAva̍ntO̍ vai dEvA ahutamAdann̍|tE̍ parA&Bavann|ta̍ EtadagnihOtraṃ̍ sarvasyaiva̍ samavadAyA̍juhavuḥ|tasmA̍dAhuḥ|agnihOtraM̍ ~Mvai dEvA gRuhAṇAM niṣkRuti-mapaśyanniti̍|yath-sAyaM̍ juhOti|rAtri̍yA̍ Eva taddhutAdyAya|36̍ (10)

yajamAnasyA-pa̍rABAvAya|yat-prAtaḥ|ahna̍# Eva taddhutAdyAya|yaja̍mAnasyA-pa̍rABAvAya|yat-tatO&śnAti̍|hutamEva̍ tat||dvayOḥ payasA̍ juhuyAt-paśukAmasya|EtadvA̍ agnihOtraM̍ mithunam|ya̍ EvaM ~MvEda|pra̍ prajayA# paśuBir-mithunair-jA̍yatE|37̍ (10)

imAmEva pUrvayA̍ duhE|amUmuttarayA|adhiśrityOtta̍ramA̍ nayati|yOnA̍vEva̍ tad-rEtaḥ̍ si~jcati prajananE||AjyE̍na̍ juhuyAt-tEjaskAmasya|tEjO̍ vA Ajya̱m|tEjasvyEva̍ Bavati|paya̍sA̍ paśukAmasya|Etadvai̍ paśUnAṃ̍ rUpam|rUpEṇaivAsmai# paśUnava# rundhE|38 (10)

paśumAnEva Bavati|daddhnEndriya̍ kAmasya|indriyaM̍ ~Mvai dadhi|indriyAvyE̍va̍ Bavati|yavAgvA̱̍ grAmakAmasyauṣadhA̍ vai manuṣyA̱ḥ|BAgadhEyE̍naivAsmai̍# sajAtAnava-rundhE|grAmyE̍va̍ Bavati||aya̍jñO̍ vA Eṣaḥ|yOsAmA|39̍ (9)

caturunnayati|catu̍rakṣaraṃ̍ rathantaram|rathantarasyaiṣa varṇaḥ|uparI̍va̍ harati|antarikṣaM̍ ~MvAmadEvyam|vAmadEvyasyaiṣa varṇaḥ|dvirju̍hOti|dvya̍kṣaraM̍ bRuhat|bRuhata Eṣa varṇaḥ|agnihOtramEva̍ tath sAmanvat-karOti||40̍ (10)

yO vA agnihOtrasyO̍pasadO̍ vEda|upai̍namupasadO̍# namanti|vindata# upasattAra̱m|unnIyOpa# sAdayati|pRuthivImEva prIṇAti|hOṣyannupa̍# sAdayati|antarikṣamEva̍ prIṇAti|hutvOpa̍# sAdayati|divamEva̍ prIṇAti|EtA̍ vA agnihOtrasyO̍pasada̍ḥ|41̍ (10)

ya EvaM ~MvEda|upai̍na-mupasadO̍# namanti|vindata# upasattAra̱m||yO vA agnihOtrasyAśrA̍vitaM̍ pratyAśrAvitaṃq̍ hOtAraM̍ brahmAṇaM̍ ~MvaṣaṭkAraM ~MvEda|tasya̍ tvEva̍ hutam|prAṇO vA agnihOtrasyAśrA̍vitam|apAnaḥ̍ pratyAśrAvitam|manO̍ hOtA̱|cakṣur-brahmA|nimEṣO̍ vaṣaṭkAraḥ|42̍ (10)

ya EvaM ~MvEda|tasya̍ tvEva̍ hutam||sAyaM ~MyAvAnaśca̍ vai dEvAḥ prAtaryAvA̍ṇaścA-gnihOtriṇO̍# gRuhamAgacCanti|tAn.̍ yanna tarpayE̱t|prajayA̱&sya paśuBirvi tiṣṭhErann|yattarpayE̱t|tRuptA̍ EnaM̍ prajayA# paśuBistarpayEyuḥ||sajUrdEvaiḥ̍ sAyaM ~MyAvaBiriti̍# sAyaṃ saM mRuśati|sajUrdEvaiḥ̍ prAtaryAvaBiriti̍# prAtaḥ|yE caiva dEvAḥ sAyaM̍ ~MyAvAnO̍ yE ca# prAtaryAvAṇaḥ|43̍ (10)

tAnEvOBayAṅ# starpayati|ta EnaM̍ tRuptAḥ prajayA# paśuBi# starpayanti||aruṇO ha# smAhaupavEśiḥ|agnihOtra̍ EvAhaṃ sAyaM prAtarvajraM̍ BrAtRuvyEByaḥ̍ pra harAmi|tasmAn-matpApI̍yAṃsO̍ BrAtRuvyA̍ iti|caturunna̍yati|dvirju̍hOti|samith-sa̍ptamI|saptapa̍dA̍ śakvarI|śAkvarO̍ vajraḥ̍ ( )|agnihOtra Eva tathsAyaM prAtarvajraM̍ ~MyajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAya̍ pra harati|Bava̍tyAtmanA̱|parA̱&sya̍ BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati||44 (13) 2.1.6 anuvAkaM 6 - aByuddravaṇaM, hOmABAvapratIkAraśca

yasyAyamRuṣaBO̍ haviḥ|indrAya̍ pariṇIyatE̱|jayAti̍ śatrumAyanta̱m|athO̍# hanti pRutanyataḥ||nRuṇAmaha# praṇIrasat|agra̍# udBindatAmasat||indra̍ śuṣmaM̍ tanuvA mErayasva|nIcA̍ viśvA# aBitiṣṭhABimA̍tIḥ|ni̍ śRuṇIhyAbAdhaM̍ ~MyO nO asti|uruM̍ nO# lOkaM kRuṇuhi̍ jIradAnO

prEhyaBiprEhi praBarA̍ sahasva|mA̍ vivEnO̍ vi śRuṇuṣvA̍ janEṣu|udI̍ḍitO̍ vRuṣaBa̍ tiṣṭha śuṣmai̱ḥ|indra śatrU̱n purO asmAka# yuddhya||agnE jEtA tvaM jaya|śatrU̱nth̍ sahasa OjasA|vi̍ śatrUnq. vimRudhO# nuda||EtaM tE stOmaM̍ tuvijAta vipraḥ|rathaM̍ na dhIraḥ svapA# atakṣam|yadIdagnE̍ prati tvaM dEva̍ haryA̱ḥ|66 (10)

suvarvatIrapa̍ EnA̍ jayEma||yO GRutEnABimAnitaḥ|indra̍ jaitrAya̍ jajñiṣE|sa naḥ saMkAsu̍ pAraya|pRutanAsAhyEṣu̍ ca||indrO# jigAya pRuthivIm|antarikṣaṃq̍ suvarmahat|vRutrahA̍ purucEta̍naḥ||indrO̍# jigAya sahasA̍ sahAṃsi|indrO̍# jigAya pRutanAni̍ viśvA̱|67 (10)

indrO# jAtO vi purO# rurOja|sa naḥ̍ paraspA varivaḥ̍ kRuṇOtu||ayaM kRutnuragRuBItaḥ|viśvaji-dudBidith-sOma̍ḥ|Ruṣir̍ vipraḥ kAvyEna||vAyura̍grEgA̍ yajñaprIḥ|sAkaM̍ ganmanasA̍ yajñam|śivO niyudBiḥ̍ śivABiḥ||vAyO̍# śukrO ayAmi̍ tE|maddhvO agraM diviṣṭiṣu|68̍ (10)

AyA# hi sOmapItayE|svAruhO̍ dEva̍ niyutvatA||imami̍ndra̍ varddhaya kṣatriyAṇAm|ayaM̍ ~MviśAM ~Mviśpatirastu̍ rAjA̱|asmA indra̍ mahi varcAṃsi̍ dhEhi|avarcasaM̍ kRuṇuhi śatrumasya||imamABa̍ja̍ grAmE aśvEṣu̍ gOṣu|niramuM̍ Baja̍ yO&mitrO̍# asya|vaṛṣman̍ kṣatrasya# kakuBi# śrayasva|tatO# na ugrO viBajA̍ vasUni||69(10)̍

asmE dyAvApRuthivI̍ BUri# vAmam|saM duhAthAM̍ GarmaduGEva̍ dhEnuḥ|ayaṃ rAjA̱ priya indrasya̍ BUyAt|priyO gavAmOṣadhInA-mutApAm||yunajmi̍# ta uttarAvanta-mindra̱m|yEna̍ jayAsi̍ na parAjayAsai|sa̍ tvA# &karEkavRuṣaBaṅ svAnA̱m|athO# rAjannuttamaM mAnavAnA̱m||utta̍rastvamadha̍rE̍ tE sapatnA̱ḥ|EkavRuṣA̍ indrasaKA̍ jigIvAn|70 (10)

viśvA AśAḥ pRutanAḥ̍ sajaMya~jjayann|aBiti̍ṣṭha̍ śatrUyataḥ sahasva||tuBya̍M̍ Baranti kṣitayO# yaviṣṭha|balimagnE̍ anti# ta Ota dUrAt|A Bandiṣṭhasya̍ sumatiM cikiddhi|bRuhattE̍# agnE mahi śarma# Badram||yO dEhyO anamayadvadhasnaiḥ|yO̍ aryapatnI-ruṣasa̍ścakAra̍|sa̍ niruddhyA nahuṣO̍ yahvO agniḥ|viśaścakrE̍ balihRutaḥ sahOBiḥ||71̍ (10)

pra sadyO agnE̍ atya̱ṣyanyAn|Aviryasmai cArutarO̍ baBUtha|IḍEnyO̍# vapuṣyO# viBAvA̱|priyO viśAmatithir-mAnu̍ṣIṇAm||brahma̍# jyEṣṭhA vIryA# saMBRutAni|brahmAgrE̍ jyEṣṭhaM divamAtatAna|Rutasya̍ brahma# prathamOta jajñE|tEnA̍ṛhati̍ brahmaṇA̍ sparddhituM̍ kaḥ||brahma srucO# GRutavatIḥ|brahma̍ṇA̍ svaravO̍ mitAḥ|72 (10)

brahma# yajñasya tantavaḥ|RutvijO̍ yE haviṣkRuta̍ḥ||śRu~ggA̍ṇIvEcCRu~ggiṇAṃq̍ saMdadRuśrirE|caṣAla̍vantaḥ̍ svaravaḥ̍ pRuthivyAm|tE dEvAsaḥ svaravastasthivAṃsa̍ḥ|namaḥ̍ saKiByaḥ̍ sannAnmA &vagAta||aBiBUragnira̍tarad-rajAṃ̍si|spRudhO̍# vihatya pRutanA̍ aBiśrIḥ|juṣAṇO ma AhutiM̍ mA mahiṣṭa|hatvA sapatnAnq. varivaskarannaḥ̍ ( )||IśAnaM̍ tvA BuvanAnA-maBiśriya̱m|staumya̍gna̍ urukRutaṃ# suvIra̱m|havir juṣAṇaḥ̍ sapatnAṃ# aBiBUrasi|jahi̍ śatrUṃqrapa mRudhO# nudasva||73 (14) 2.4.8 anuvAkaM 8 - upahOmAḥ

sa pratnavannavI̍yasA|agnE̱̍ dyumnEna# sam~MyatA̱|bRuhat tatantha BAnunA̱||navaM nu stOmamagnayE̱|divaḥ̍ śyEnAya# jIjanam|vasO̱ḥ kuvidvanAti# naḥ||svAruhA yasya śriyO# dRuśE|rayirvIravatO̍ yathA|agrE# yajñasya cEtataḥ||adA̱Byaḥ̍ pura EtA|74 (10)

agnirviśAM mAnuṣIṇAm|tUrṇI̍ rathaḥ sadA navaḥ||navaṃq̍ sOmAya̍ vAjinE̱|AjyaM payasO&jani|juṣṭaṃq̍ śucitamaM̍ ~Mvasu||navaṃ̍# sOma juṣasva naḥ|pIyUṣasyEha̍ tRupṇuhi|yastE̍# BAga RutAvayam||navasya̍ sOma tE vayam|A sumatiM̍ ~MvRuṇImahE|75̍ (10)

sa nO# rAsva sahasriṇaḥ||navaṃ̍# havirjuṣasva̍ naḥ|RutuBiḥ̍ sOma BUtamam|tada~gga̍ pratiharya̍ naḥ|rAjana̱th sOma svastayE̱||navaṅq stOmaM navaṃ# haviḥ|indrAgniByAM nivEdaya|tajju̍ṣEtAṃq̍ sacEtasA||śuciM̍ nu stOmaM navajAtamadya|indrA̱gnI̍ vRutrahaṇA juṣEthA̱m|76 (10)

uBA hi vAṃ# suhavA jOhavImi|tA̍ vAjaṃ# sadya uśatE̍ dhEṣṭhA̱||agnirindrO navasya̍ naḥ|asya havyasya# tRupyatAm|iha dEvau sahasriṇau̱||yajñaM̍ na A hi gacCatAm|vasu̍mantaṃ̍ suvarvida̱m|asya havyasya# tRupyatAm|agnirindrO navasya̍ naḥ||viśvA̱n dEvAṅ starpayata|77̍ (10)

haviṣO&sya navasya̍ naḥ|suvarvidO hi jajñirE||EdaM̍ barqḥiḥ suṣṭarImA̍ navEna|ayaM̍ ~MyajñO yajamAnasya̍ BAgaḥ|ayaM baBUva̍ Buvanasya̍ garBaḥ|viśvE̍# dEvA idamadyAgamiṣṭhAḥ||imE̍ nu dyAvApRuthivI̍ samIcI̱|tanvAnE yajñaM purupEśa̍saM̍ dhiyA|A&smai# pRuṇItAM BuvanAni̍ viśvA̱|prajAM puṣṭimamRutaM̍ navEna||78̍ (10)

imE dhEnU amRutaM ~MyE duhAtE̱|payasva-tyuttarAmE̍tu̍ puṣṭiḥ|imaM̍ ~MyajñaM juṣamAṇE̍ navEna|samIcI̍ dyAvApRuthivI̍ GRutAcI̱||yaviṣṭhO̍ havyavAhanaḥ|citraBA̍nur-GRutAsu̍tiḥ|nava̍jAtO̍ virOcasE|agnE̍ tattE# mahitvanam||tvamagnE̍ dEvatA̱Byaḥ|BAgE dEva̍ na mIyasE|79̍ (10)

sa EnA̍ vidvAn. yakṣyasi|navaṅq̍ stOmaM̍ juṣasva naḥ||agniḥ prathamaḥ̍ prAśnAtu|sa̍ hi vEda yathA# haviḥ|śivA asmaBya-mOṣadhIḥ|kRuṇOtu̍# viśvacaṛṣaṇiḥ||BadrAnnaḥ̍ śrEyaḥ samanaiṣṭa̍ dEvAḥ|tvayA&vasEna̍ samaśImahi̍ tvA|sa nO# mayOBUḥ pitO̍ Aviśasva|śaM̍ tOkAya# tanuvE̱ syOnaḥ ( )||Etamu tyaM madhunA̍ sam~MyutaM̍ ~Myava̱m|sarasvatyA̍ adhimanAva̍carkRuṣuḥ|indra̍# AsIth sIrapatiḥ̍ śatakratuḥ|kInAśA̍# Asan marutaḥ̍ sudAnavaḥ||80̍ (14) PrapAṭaka kOrvai with starting words of 1 to 8 anuvAkams :- (juṣṭa - ścakṣuṣO̍ - juṣṭI# narO - naktaM jAtA - vRuṣA sa - uta nO - vRuṣA̱&syaṃqśuḥ - sa pratnavadaṣṭau)̍ kOrvai with starting words of 1, 11, 21 series of :- (juṣṭO# - manyur BagO - juṣṭI# narO - harivarpasaM̍ giraḥ - śiprin̍ vAjAnA - muta nO - yad vAgvadantI̍ - viśvA AśA aśItiḥ̍ ) first and last word - 2nd aṣṭakam 3rd prapAṭakam :- (juṣṭaḥ̍ - sudAnavaḥ̍ )||hariḥ̍ OM|||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya brAhmaṇE dvitIyAṣṭakE caturthaḥ prapAṭhakaḥ samAptaḥ||=======================
